name: DanganRonpa: IT'S SHOWTIME! - Prologue
description:
Sixteen stu--excuse me, contestants are invited to participate in a reality game show. However, things are not what they seem to be...

DanganRonpa: IT'S SHOWTIME! is a non-profit fangame inspired by the DanganRonpa game series (please support the official release).
